cipher_gy2277 package¶

Submodules¶

cipher_gy2277.cipher_gy2277 module¶

cipher_gy2277.cipher_gy2277.cipher(text, shift, encrypt=True)[source]¶

Encrypting or deecrpting using Caesar cipher.

Parameters

  • text (str) – The contents to be encrypted or decrypted

  • shift (int) – A fixed number of positions that each letter in text is shifted down (positive) or up (negative)

  • encrypt (bool) – If True, then the text is encrypted; otherwise, the text is decrypted

Returns

The encrypted or decrypted text.

Return type

str

Examples

>>> from cipher_gy2277 import cipher_gy2277
>>> text = "cat"
>>> shift = 3
>>> cipher_yuan_gan.cipher(text, shift)
'fdw'
